promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute simple gorilla grass-type pokemon with a regal tail. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Tailope, a a chibi cute simple gorilla grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Sting. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "grass" or "Tailope". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, gorilla-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sunlight ray ambience
generatedDescription: This petite, leafy primate thrives in lush woodland homes, using its stinging tendrils to playfully swing between trees and protect its territory.
